nodes.text: Zuchii Wraps were food items made from zuchii served in a flat piece of bread called a ronto wrapper and topped with vegetables. They were offered Bakkar's Ronto Roasters in Black Spire Outpost on the planet Batuu and offered as a vegetarian alternative to the Ronto Wrap.

Zuchii Wrap was an item found at the real Ronto Roasters restaurant in Star Wars: Galaxy's Edge at Disney's Hollywood Studios. According to the restaurant's menu it included, "Grilled Zucchini, Smoky Chickpea-Onion Slaw, Creamy Garlic-Tahini Sauce, and Fresh Cilantro wrapped in Pita Bread." Not originally part of the menu at the restaurant's opening, the wrap debuted on March 17th, 2021.
